mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.user_id, /* ✅ 방별 닉네임이 있으면 우선 사용, 없으면 글로벌 닉네임 → 이름 */ COALESCE(rjr.request_user_nickname, u.nickname, u.name) AS nickname, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted_at FROM board_comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN board_posts p ON p.post_id = c.post_id LEFT JOIN room_join_request rjr ON rjr.room_id = p.room_id AND rjr.request_user_email = u.email AND rjr.status = '승인' WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.comment_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comments (post_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content})
